com.cubeia.firebase.poker.pokerbots.server.local

Class LocalServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cubeia.firebase.poker.pokerbots.server.local.LocalServer

  • public class LocalServer
extends Object
    This is a Singleton that wraps the local bot server. This implementation is a bit more transparent towards the current implementation.
